resources.string: Decipher the encrypted text to reveal the motivational quote!
Use the keyboard to select hints and insert answers.
Are you sure you’d like to skip this puzzle?
Are you sure you’d like to reveal the selected letter?
Are you sure you’d like to reset this puzzle?
Whoops! Looks like we couldn’t load the puzzle.

“%1$s”
— %2$s

Decipher cryptograms to reveal quotes like these! %3$s
I’m working on a quote by %1$s!\n\nDecipher cryptograms to reveal quotes like these! %2$s
Please enter the puzzle number to go to:

Decipher the encrypted text to reveal the motivational quote!

A cryptogram is a type of puzzle that consists of a short piece of encrypted text. The cipher used to encrypt the text is a simple substitution of letters and is simple enough that the cryptogram can be solved by hand.

%1$s for Android works completely offline, so you can enjoy some brain teasers while traveling.

Made by the Netherlands’ top Android developers at Pixplicity, this simple little game showcases our passion for apps and our attention to detail.

Best of all, it’s completely free, and free of ads! Enjoy!

Anonymous crash and usage data may be sent to Crashlytics by Twitter. This is solely used to gather anonymous statistics about usage for automatic reporting of any issues. There is strictly no identifiable information transferred.

THIS APP COMES WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND AND IS COPYRIGHT OF PIXPLICITY B.V., THE NETHERLANDS.

Nice, you're solving some cryptograms!

Would you mind visiting the Play store to give %1$s a rating? It would help in sharing the fun!

Instead, if you're experiencing problems, please give me some feedback so I can improve. Thanks!
